channel.title: Dclaws speed to slow, how to make it hit 4x?
channel.description:
ok when i do the dclaws spec it only hit;s twice, how do i make it hit 4times?
and the gfx/anim or what ever is to slow, any clue on how to fix this?

item.title: Dclaws speed to slow, how to make it hit 4x?
item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

case 3101: //Dragon claws p.requestForceChat("DIE NOOB!!!! RAWR!!"); p.requestAnim(0x426, 0); p.requestGFX(1950, 0); p.requestGFX(87, 0); en.appendHit(getRandom(18), 0); en.appendHit(getRandom(15), 0); pm.setSpecDelay2(3); pm.setSpecDelay(2); p.enableSpecDamage = true; isSpecWep = true; break;

Thats what it is for 508â€¦ hope that helps? :L

item.title: Dclaws speed to slow, how to make it hit 4x?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

no its usally in client.java like

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && specialAmount > 24) // Dragon Longsword { specialAtk(false, 25, 248, 1058); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit); }

^ is my spec method for my d longsword. lookup ure d claws code.
